text: Media playback is not supported on this device'I would hope that I would win against Serena'Serena Williams disputes John McEnroe's claims that she would struggle to be in the world's top 700 if she was on the men's circuit. But the male player ranked 701 in the world - Dmitry Tursunov - believes he could beat her. Speaking to US radio station NPR, seven - time Grand Slam champion McEnroe said of former world number one Williams, who has won an Open - era record 23 Grand Slams : ` ` If she played the men's circuit she'd be, like, 700 in the world.'' He qualified the comments by saying : ` ` That doesn't mean I don't think Serena is an incredible player
